'''Mariana Graham''', better known as '''RazzleberryFox''', previously worked at [[Mojang Studios]] as Animator, Modeler and Texture Artist<ref>[[Special:Diff/1029232|this edit by RazzleberryFox]]</ref> since October 17, 2016.<ref>{{tweet|razzleberryfox|788074202708443140|Today was my first day working @Mojang and it was really nice and inspiring. Thanks to everyone for making me feel so welcome <3|October 17, 2016}}</ref> She is well known for creating the [[ftb:DecoCraft|DecoCraft]] mod, as well as contributing models and artwork to many other mods.<ref>[[ftb:RazzleberryFox]]</ref> She is a content creator for the Minecraft [[Marketplace]].

== Biography ==

Mariana was born in [[Wikipedia:Mexico City|Mexico City, Mexico]].<ref>{{tweet|razz|806564159697600512|@MCPEElytra México City, México :)}}</ref> She announced her engagement to [[Thomas Guimbretière]] on August 10, 2016,<ref>{{tweet|razz|763410142113169408|I... said ... YES! *squeal* @ProfMobius <3 @RazzleberryFox|August 10, 2016}}</ref> and they were married on September 10, 2016.<ref>{{tweet|searge||Congratulations Mr. and Mrs. Moebius @ProfMobius @RazzleberryFox live long and prosper and may the force be with you|September 10, 2016}}</ref>
